data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Kassérine, Tunisia to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 439,069 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kassérine, Tunisia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, move the 131 believers in the state of Kassérine to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.section_summary: On average, 87 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Kassérine, Tunisia.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
There are 439,200 people living in the state of Kassérine. Only about 131 might be believers.
Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Kassérine a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, encourage the 131 believers in Kassérine to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Kassérine, Tunisia.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Kassérine.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
